title: Drawing, "Drawing.  Sketches from Rome.  A. St. Peters and the Vatican Place shown from the northeast.  B, C. View of "Castle St. Angelo, Claude's Villa, St. Peters" from the left bank of the Tiber.", March 18, 1869
markings: Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center:  Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with color notations across center:  reddish / grey / green /reeds etc. / brown & green; again, at upper right: setting sun - 4 inches from edge; again, at lower left:  red / muddy; again, at lower center:  rich orange red sky; again, at bottom center:  March 18th / 69 Castle St. Angelo / Claude's Villa / St. Peters - / 2- parts
description: Horizontal view of the Roman landscape from the banks of the Tiber River looking South with the Castle Sant Angelo, Claude's Villa and Saint Peter's Basilica in the distance.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawing.  Sketches from Rome.  A. St. Peters and the Vatican Place shown from the northeast.  B, C. View of "Castle St. Angelo, Claude's Villa, St. Peters" from the left bank of the Tiber.", March 18, 1869.
March 18, 1869. Graphite on green-gray wove paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-594-c.
